entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 10 April 2023
